description: In an exclusive interview on his legacy, President Obama speaks to The Times’s Mark Landler and Coral Davenport on climate change while visiting Marine Corps Base Hawaii.
title: Obama on ‘Terrifying’ Threat of Climate Change
title_page: Obama on ‘Terrifying’ Threat of Climate Change - Video - NYTimes.com
text: In an exclusive interview on his legacy, President Obama speaks to The Times’s Mark Landler and Coral Davenport on climate change while visiting Marine Corps Base Hawaii.
